name: The Happy Cow (Samuel Mcarthur-Mclean)
description:
Created for the  B.E.A.N.S Game Jam.

A game that aim to tackle issues with the farming industry. In this light-hearted 2D sidescroller you play as a cow making they're way through a  story about mega farms. 

Developed by:

Patrick Carranza, Niall Ewart, Sam McArthur-McLean, & Craig Bevan.

Additional thanks to James Paton & Marcus Rose.
